bug.author: mcombalia
bug.description: I am not able to label the image using the brush with multiple labels. When I switch to the second label, it changes the label of the painted region.

comments.comment: You need to unselect the current path first. Press 'u' to do it or the button on "Results" panel. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/501780/85851849-26244c80-b7b8-11ea-86d9-68c073dac97c.png></denchmark-link>
Thank you so much! My fault.
